column1: The Watch was a body of Hobbits responsible for maintaining the peace in the Shire. Its members wore caps with feathers to distinguish themselves.

column2: a police force of twelve hobbits (three in each Farthings) responsible for Internal Work
column4: a larger body that guarded the borders of the Shire. The head of the Watch was the First Shirriff
column5: a post attached to that of the Mayor of Michel Delving.

column2: the body was greatly increased by him and the Chief Shirriff.  This expanded force was organized into companies
column3: one of which was the First Eastfarthing Troop.
